title: Matt Cohler Lists Swanky Manhattan Penthouse for $29.5 Million
text:
Matt Cohler, an early Facebook employee who went on to become one of Silicon Valley’s better known venture capitalists, is putting his penthouse in Manhattan’s Nolita neighborhood on the market for $29.5 million.

Mr. Cohler, 42, whose firm Benchmark has made successful investments in companies like Instagram and Dropbox, doesn’t foresee making a big return on this purchase. He bought the apartment just over a year ago for $29.95 million, records show, and subsequently renovated it extensively. He also bought two parking...
description: One of Facebook’s first employees lists his extensively renovated home for $29.5 million, or about what he paid for it, as he plots a move uptown.
